original_text:
In the days of her affliction and wandering
    Jerusalem remembers all the treasures
    that were hers in days of old.
When her people fell into enemy hands,
    there was no one to help her.
Her enemies looked at her
    and laughed at her destruction.
korean_text: 예루살렘이 환난과 유리하는 고통을 당하는 날에 옛날의 모든 즐거움을 기억하였음이여 그의 백성이 대적의 손에 넘어졌으나 그를 돕는 자가 없었고 대적들은 그의 멸망을 비웃는도다

sentences.original_text: In the days of her affliction
that were hers in days of old
When her people fell into enemy hands
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀의 백성들이 적의 손에 넘어갔을 때

sentences.original_text: there was no one to help her
